amendment.description: Amendments provide for the establishment in the Department of State of an Office to Monitor and Combat anti-Semitism and establishes standards for the reporting on anti-Semitism when appropriate in human rights and religious freedom reports.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MI) amendments (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments (A001) offered by Mr. Smith (MI).
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Smith (MI) amendments (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (MI) amendments (A001) Agreed to without objection.
